holidays.title: International Sudoku Day
holidays.description: Sudoku enthusiasts will no doubt notice the date’s symbolism.

holidays.title: California Admission Day
holidays.description: Celebrate with us as California commemorates the day it became an American state.

holidays.title: Care Bears Share Your Care Day
holidays.description: This special day is all about love and care! Ready to show it?

holidays.title: Carl Garner Federal Lands Cleanup Day
holidays.description: On Carl Garner Federal Lands Cleanup Day, let’s find out how to get involved in our areas.

holidays.title: Drive Your Studebaker Day
holidays.description: Learn why Studebaker is regarded as the most exquisite car of the 20th century.

holidays.title: Emergency Services Day
holidays.description: Emergency Services Day is an opportunity to celebrate the heroes saving lives by providing emergency services.

holidays.title: Farmers' Consumer Awareness Day
holidays.description: Farmers' Consumer Awareness Day is the most exciting way to learn where your food comes from.

holidays.title: Free Dentistry Day
holidays.description: Say goodbye to that toothache because dentists are available to help you for free today.

holidays.title: German Language Day
holidays.description: German is the language of poets Bertolt Brecht, Rainer Maria Rilke, and classic Weimar-era cinema.

holidays.title: International Box Wine Day
holidays.description: Show your appreciation for sustainable wine packaging by sipping some box wine on this day.

holidays.title: International Day to Protect Education from Attack
holidays.description: Explore the history and significance of the day and discover why we need to protect education.

holidays.title: International Fetal Alcohol Spectrum Disorders Awareness Day
holidays.description: Today we remind you that it’s never a good idea to take alcohol while pregnant.

holidays.title: National When Pigs Fly Day
holidays.description: Have faith that miracles can happen and when they do, share them today.

holidays.title: National Wiener Schnitzel Day
holidays.description: This renowned dish is considered an Austrian delicacy in its beautiful capital, Vienna.

holidays.title: Steak Au Poivre Day
holidays.description: Get ready to stick your fork into one of the most succulent meals ever invented.

holidays.title: Tajikistan Independence Day
holidays.description: Join us as we learn more about Tajikistan’s incredible journey toward independence.

holidays.title: Teddy Bear Day
holidays.description: Get excited as we celebrate one of the world's most loyal best friends — the teddy bear.

holidays.title: Wonderful Weirdos Day
holidays.description: Don't be afraid to embrace and explore your quirkiness on Wonderful Weirdos Day.

holidays.title: Adam Sandler’s Birthday
holidays.description: Adam Sandler has created a timeless legacy as an actor, comedian, and filmmaker.

holidays.title: Colonel Sanders’s Birthday
holidays.description: Colonel Sanders is one of the most well-known figures in the history of fast food.

holidays.title: Eboni K. Williams’s Birthday
holidays.description: Eboni K. Williams uses her voice to discuss a wide range of issues, including politics, social justice, sports, and pop culture.

holidays.title: Fai Khadra’s Birthday
holidays.description: Fai Khadra is a popular Saudi-born model and singer, often associated with the Kardashians.

holidays.title: Hugh Grant’s Birthday
holidays.description: Here is a closer look at the long career of Hugh Grant.

holidays.title: Michelle Williams’s Birthday
holidays.description: Michelle Williams is a Hollywood actress, winner of two Golden Globes and one Emmy Award.

holidays.title: William Papa’s Birthday
holidays.description: This TikToker is scared of short people! Let’s learn more surprising facts!
